soft_trend_explanation: PIAAC Cycle 1 made use of the old version of ISCED (ISCED 1997) as the new one was not yet implemented at the time the national versions of the BQ were developed. For PIAAC Cycle 2 we use a coding scheme based on ISCED 2011, distinguishing a maximum of 29 different categories: this allows a good differentiation between different levels and types of qualifications

soft_trend_explanation: The term “activity” was changed into “training activity” for consistency reasons. Furthermore, the content of the interviewer instruction was included in the item itself (after some rewording) following suggestions resulting from the pretest.

generic_label_en: Main  reason  for participating in training
generic_label_de: Hauptgrund für die Teilnahme am Training
soft_trend_explanation: Some response categories were changed compared to Cycle 1, partly because they overlapped. One category was added to get information about important aspects not covered in Cycle 1 (“To better deal with new or changing work tasks”). The first response category, "To do my job better and/or improve career prospects" was split up for Cycle 2 and three categories which were not mentioned frequently in Cycle 1 or that overlapped with other response options were deleted ("To be less likely to lose my job"; "To increase my possibilities of getting a job, or changing a job or profession"; “To start my own business”). In the category "To obtain a certificate", the aspect of renewing a certificate was included following the pretest. The wording of the question was changed slightly by dropping "more precisely" which was regarded as redundant.

generic_label_en: Employment status when participating in training
generic_label_de: Beschäftigungsstatus bei Teilnahme an der Ausbildung
soft_trend_explanation: In Cycle 1, this item only asked whether the respondent was employed (full- or part-time). This was broadened to include other statuses.

generic_label_de: Die Schulung fand in normaler Arbeitsumgebung statt

soft_trend_explanation: The answer categories for firm size are changed to bring them in line with the international definition. This was recommended by the working group on 'Skills use and mismatch'. See document 'Improving the measurement of skills use and mismatch in the second cycle of PIAAC' (pp. 17).

The answer categories for firm size are changed to bring them in line with the international definition. This was recommended by the working group on 'Skills use and mismatch'. See document 'Improving the measurement of skills use and mismatch in the second cycle of PIAAC' (pp. 17).

The answer categories for the contract type are updated to bring them in line with the ongoing change on the labour market. Two contract types are added: a zero hour contract and a freelance, contractor and/or consultant contract. Also, seasonal contracts are now explicitly mentioned with the fixed term contracts category. This was recommended by the working group on 'Skills use and mismatch'. See document 'Improving the measurement of skills use and mismatch in the second cycle of PIAAC' (pp.

generic_label_en: Use a calculator - either hand-held or computer based
generic_label_de: Verwenden Sie einen Taschenrechner – entweder in der Hand oder am Computer
Verwenden Sie einfache Algebra oder Formeln

generic_label_en: Use more advanced math or statistics
generic_label_de: Verwenden Sie fortgeschrittenere Mathematik oder Statistiken
Führen Sie Transaktionen im Internet durch

generic_label_en: Use a programming language to program or write computer code
generic_label_de: Verwenden Sie eine Programmiersprache, um Computercode zu programmieren oder zu schreiben

generic_label_en: When I hear or read about new ideas, I try to relate them to real life situations to which they might apply
generic_label_de: Wenn ich von neuen Ideen höre oder lese, versuche ich, sie mit realen Situationen in Verbindung zu bringen, auf die sie anwendbar sein könnten

generic_label_en: When I come across something new, I try to relate it to what I already know
generic_label_de: Wenn ich auf etwas Neues stoße, versuche ich, es mit dem in Verbindung zu bringen, was ich bereits weiß

generic_label_en: I like to get to the bottom of difficult things
generic_label_de: Ich mag es, schwierigen Dingen auf den Grund zu gehen

generic_label_en: I like to figure out how different ideas fit together
generic_label_de: Ich mag es herauszufinden, wie verschiedene Ideen zusammenpassen

generic_label_en: If I don't understand something, I look for additional information to make it clearer
generic_label_de: Wenn ich etwas nicht verstehe, suche ich nach zusätzlichen Informationen, um es klarer zu machen
